ondru mannil irangi
vanthathuvo..

mangai avalathu
manhira kangal
chandhirar sooriyar
aanadhuvo..

kandaen azhagiya
kolusu kolusu
thirugaani aanathu
manasu mansu

innaal anubavam

aval paadhak
kolusoli kaetkum podhu

athu tholainthum naan
thaedavillai

siragai vaangi ada
parakkanum pola irukku

vetti kizhiyin kaalgal
vaangi ada kuthikkanum
pola irukku

naan aanen aanen.

pallam uligal koodi
